ring.$description: Focus ring color for keyboard navigation. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

focus.$description: System focus color (high accessibility). Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

base.$description: Base focus ring width. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

accessible.$description: Accessible focus ring width for high contrast. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.
